name: ceddlyburge-elm-league-table-from-sheet
description: A website to calculate and show league tables based on league results entered in a Google Sheet
author: Cedd Burge

scripts.postinstall: npm run globalinstall -g && npm run elminstall
scripts.globalinstall: npm install create-elm-app@1.10.4 -g && npm install elm-github-install -g
scripts.elminstall: elm-package install -y && cd tests && elm-package install -y && cd .. && cd EndToEndTests && elm-install
scripts.netlifybuild: npm run globalinstall && elm-package install -y && npm run build
